name: Dark Roblox [REVAMPED]
description:
Dark theme for Roblox, Roblox wiki, and the devforum.

Works with Google Chrome!
additional_info:
Version 2

- Bug fixes
- Applied roundify

Version 3

- Applied a Adblocker
- Applied my version of ROBLOX 2019

Version 3.1

- Removed logo-sort-of credit from the creator since it was blocking the original roblox logo on trades tab (on the custom ROBLOX 2019)

Version 3.2

- Added better colors

span{background-color:transparent}.game-stats-container{color:var(--text)}.vote-background{background-color:var(--button)}.vote-percentage{background-color:var(--text-dark)}#ctl00_cphRoblox_GroupSearchBar_SearchButton,#ctl00_cphRoblox_GroupStatusPane_StatusTextBox,#MemberSearchText,#rbx-current-page,#JoinRequestSearchText,#ctl00_ctl00_cphRoblox_cphMyRobloxContent_AllyNameTextBox,#ctl00_cphRoblox_GroupWallPane_GroupWallPager_ctl01_PageTextBox,#ChangeOwnerTextBox,#roles div div table tbody tr td input,#PageInput{border-style:solid}.accord-header,.accord-header:hover{background:var(--content);border-color:var(--body)}button[disabled],button[disabled]:hover,button[disabled]:focus,button[disabled]:active{background-color:var(--section)!important;border-color:var(--section-highlight)!important;color:var(--text-dark)!important}.chat-main{box-shadow:0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.74)}#this-carousel-id{border-top-color:var(--body)}.obc-theme-v2 .container-main>.content{outline-color:var(--header)}span[style="color:#7F007F"] a{color:#7F007F}
}

@-moz-document domain("www.roblox.com"), domain("web.roblox.com"), domain("forum.roblox.com") {
#groups-switcher,.btn-control-md,.btn-control-xs,.btn-primary-md,.btn-secondary-md,.btn-secondary-xs,.dialog-container.dialog-visible,.dropdown-menu,.form-control,.form-group,.game-card-container,.game-card-native-ad,.game-card-thumb,.input-dropdown-btn,.item-card-container,.menu-vertical,.nav-menu-title,.popover,.popover-content,.profile-container .asset-item img,.profile-container .asset-item span[title],.scroller,.section-content,.stack-row,.vertical-menu,div.col-sm-6.text-overflow.slide-item-container-right.groups,img.header-thumb{border-radius:14px!important}.section-content-off{border-radius:14px}.btn-primary-lg{border-radius:30px;padding:12px}div.col-sm-6.slide-item-container-left div a img{border-radius:30px!important}#chat-header,#chat-main,#dialog-container,.chat-windows-header,.dialog-container.group-dialog.ng-scope.dialog-visible{border-radius:14px 14px 0 0!important}.dialog-message{border-radius:10px!important}.small.dialog-message.dialog-message-content.dialog-triangle.ng-binding{box-shadow:none}#navbar-search-input{border:none}.nav-menu-title,.nav-menu-title:hover{background:rgba(0,0,0,0)!important}#navbar-search-btn{visibility:hidden}#CreateGroupBtn,.translate{border:none;border-radius:10px;box-shadow:0 0 4px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.2);background:#fcfcfc}#CreateGroupBtn,#ctl00_cphRoblox_GroupSearchBar_SearchButton,.btn-control.btn-control-medium,.btn-control.btn-control-medium:hover{background-image:none;background-color:#00A2FF;color:#fff;font-family:'Source Sans Pro',Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:14px;padding-left:8px;padding-right:8px;border:none;height:25px!important}#ctl00_cphRoblox_GroupSearchBar_SearchKeyword,#ctl00_cphRoblox_GroupStatusPane_StatusTextBox{padding:10px;border:none}.GroupControlsBox{border:none;background:#fff;padding:8px;border-radius:20px;box-shadow:0 0 4px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.2)}#CreateGroupBtn{background-image:none!important;font-size:18px!important;height:35px!important;border-radius:100px}#navigation{transform:translate(0);transition:ease-out 70ms}#horizontal-tabs,.page-content .rbx-tabs-horizontal .rbx-tab,.rbx-tab-heading{border-radius:14px!important;box-shadow:none!important}#horizontal-tabs{margin-top:4px!important;margin-bottom:4px!important;background:rgba(0,0,0,0)}.rbx-tab{width:23%!important;margin-right:1%;margin-left:1%;padding:10px}.rbx-tab .rbx-tab-heading:hover{background-color:#efefef;transition:ease-out .1s}.rbx-tab .rbx-tab-heading{background-color:#fff;transition:ease-out .1s;box-shadow:0 2px 4px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.2)!important}.rbx-tab .rbx-tab-heading:hover{box-shadow:0 2px 6px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.25)!important}#mCSB_1_container ul li{padding:2px;transition:ease-out .2s}#mCSB_1_container ul li:hover{transition:ease-out .2s;background-color:#efefef;border-radius:8px}#mCSB_1_container ul li a span,#mCSB_1_container ul li a span:hover{color:#000!important}.rbx-tab.active .rbx-tab-heading,.rbx-tab.active .rbx-tab-heading:hover{color:#fff!important;background:#00A2FF!important;transition:ease-out .1s!important}.rbx-tab.active .rbx-tab-heading{box-shadow:0 2px 6px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.2)!important}.dropdown-menu,.dropdown-menu li:hover,.menu-option.active,.popover-content{box-shadow:none!important}.dropdown-menu li,.dropdown-menu li:hover{transition:ease-out .15s}.enable-three-dee.btn-control.btn-control-small,button.input-addon-btn{border-radius:100px!important;border:none!important}.form-control.input-field.search-input.ng-pristine.ng-valid.ng-empty.ng-valid-maxlength.ng-touched{margin-right:10px;border:none!important;box-shadow:0 1px 4px 0 rgba(25,25,25,.3)}footer.container-footer{border-radius:40px 40px 0 0;width:90%;margin-left:5%;margin-right:5%}.home-header-content h1 a{font-weight:300;font-size:30px}button.input-dropdown-btn.category-options.ng-scope{margin-right:10px;border:none!important;box-shadow:0 1px 4px 0 rgba(25,25,25,.3)}
}

@-moz-document url("https://www.roblox.com/my/groups.aspx"), url-prefix("https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=") {
#Body,#rbx-body{background:#efefef}#SearchControls{border:none;background:rgba(0,0,0,0)}.GroupListContainer.StandardBox{border:none!important;background:#fff!important;border-radius:20px;padding:6px}#left-column{width:140px;margin-right:10px}
}

@-moz-document url("https://www.roblox.com/my/avatar") {
.rbx-tab{width:18%!important;margin-right:1%;margin-left:1%;padding:10px}
}

@-moz-document url-prefix("https://www.roblox.com/my/messages/") {
ul.nav.nav-tabs{background:rgba(0,0,0,0)!important;box-shadow:none!important}li#next.pager-next a,li#previous a,li.first a,li.last a{border-radius:100px!important;border:none!important}.btn-control-sm{border-radius:14px!important;border:none!important;box-shadow:0 1px 4px 0 rgba(25,25,25,.3);padding:7px 12px}label#includePreviousMessage::before,label#messageCheckbox::before,label#userCheckbox::before{border-radius:100px!important}div.message-reply textarea{border-radius:12px!important}#roblox-reply-btn,div.roblox-sendMessage-action button,div.section-content-off.ng-binding{border-radius:14px}.messages .messageDivider{transition:ease-out .2s;margin-bottom:4px;border-radius:14px;box-shadow:0 1px 4px 0 rgba(25,25,25,.3)}.messages .messageDivider:hover{transition:ease-out .2s;box-shadow:0 1px 6px 0 rgba(25,25,25,.5)}
}

@-moz-document url-prefix("https://www.roblox.com/users/") {
.rbx-tab{width:48%!important;margin-right:1%;margin-left:1%;padding:10px}
}
@-moz-document domain("roblox.com") {
/*  Fade-in, blur & shadows */

	.dropdown-menu {
                            animation: fadein 0.5s; 
                            box-shadow: 0px 0px 100px;
                                        }

	.roblox-popover-content.bottom .notification-stream-wrap.open {
                                      box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px;      
                                        }

	.chat-main {
                             box-shadow: 0px 0px 15px;                
                                        }

	@keyframes blur {
                              from {
                              filter: blur(25px);
                              }
                                            to {
                                            filter: blur(0px)
                                            }
                                        }

	.menu-vertical .menu-option .menu-secondary-option  {
                                           animation: fadein 0.5s;  
                                        }

	.menu-secondary-container {
                                    animation: fadein 0.5s;         
                                        }



	#header {
    		opacity: 1;
    		box-shadow: 0px 0px 25px;
    		/*display: none;*/
			}

	.rbx-left-col {  
 			box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px;
    		}

	@keyframes fadein {
                              from {
                              opacity: 0;
                              }
                                            to {
                                            opacity: 1
                                            }
                                        }

	@-moz-keyframes fadein {
                              from {
                              opacity: 0;
                              }
                                            to {
                                            opacity: 1
                                            }
                                        }

	@-webkit-keyframes fadein {
                              from {
                              opacity: 0;
                              }
                                            to {
                                            opacity: 1
                                            }
                                        }

	@-o-keyframes fadein {
                              from {
                              opacity: 0;
                              }
                                            to {
                                            opacity: 1
                                            }
                                        }

	@keyframes fadeout {
                              from {
                              opacity: 1;
                              }
                                            to {
                                            opacity: 0
                                            }
                                        }



/*  Adblock */


	.ad,
	.ad *,
	.img_ad,
	.ad-annotations,
	#google_image_div,
	#aw0,
	#AdvertisingLeaderboard {
                                      display: inherit !important;
                                            filter: blur(0px);
                                        }

	.ad,
	.ad *,
	.img_ad,
	.ad-annotations,
	#google_image_div,
	#aw0,
	#AdvertisingLeaderboard {
                                      display: inherit !important;
                                            filter: blur(0px);
                                        }


/*  Animations */


.chat-container.collapsed .chat-main,
.chat-main,
.dialog-container,
.dialog-container.collapsed {
    transition: height 1s
}

.chat-friend-list .chat-friend-container,
.input-group-btn .dropdown-menu li a {
    transition: box-shadow 1s
}



	.game-card-container:hover {
 		   transition: height 1s, top 1s;
 			   height: 107%;
 				   top: 0px;
 					   box-shadow: 1px 1px 25px
					}

		#navigation {
				 transition: width 1s   
							}
}
